channel.title: .:Compiler Problems:
channel.description:
Ok, i'm seriously going crazy. Whenever I go to compile my server, it says "You do not have java installed. Please download it at the site about to come up." But i've downloaded Java twice.
Here's what's in it:@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

item.title: .:Compiler Problems:
item.dc:creator: @Jordan15975 Jordan15975
item.description:
@Jordan15975 wrote:

Ok, i’m seriously going crazy. Whenever I go to compile my server, it says “You do not have java installed. Please download it at the site about to come up.” But i’ve downloaded Java twice.

Here’s what’s in it:@echo off
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

Read full topic
